name: Mattie D. Moran
statement: I bought a decant and got lot of compliments the very first time I wore it but to be honest, it just smells like sweetened Povidone-iodine to me. I don't think I'm willing to spend that much to smell like a sweet antiseptic.

name: Frances V. Strong
statement: I find it to be overly sweet, the kind of sweet that gives you cavities :) I wouldn't use it on myself but I still enjoy it as a room spray on cold winter nights to create a warm and cozy atmosphere.

name: Tommy S. Mayes
statement: This smells incredible. The yummiest pistachio caramel with amber and beachy salt with soft florals. Mostly pistachio and caramel. I put off buying it for years, but its so good! A must buy if you love gourmands.

name: Francis L. Farrier
statement: So excited about this one, i knew i needed to pick it up when it was compared it to secret charm on here! I absolutely loooove that scent and havenâ€™t seen it in years. I was not disappointed it smells so clean just like secret charm

name: Richard V. Jones
statement: To me, it smells like a fresh cut green tea leaves infusion like the Replica Matcha, + the heart of the Declaration. It is very nice, clean and easy to wear. Perfect for spring :)

name: Verna V. Allen
statement: sickening sweetness, like falling in a tub of syrup and being unable to free yourself from its sticky grip. this is strong, raunchy, molasses-like sweetness like ive never smelt before. i imagine its the sort of thing that would drive men wild if worn on a woman. this is what i imagine is the modern equivalent to tabu in concept, smell of a whore. its sublime.
